name: phonebook_backend
description: This is the backend for the phonebook project.
author: Tongxin Sun

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebookBackend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cd ../../ && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
